https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wCEFWIIkUV4JyLSqhw98aZfRHQA.jpg One week in the making of David Lynch's 2017 continuation of his groundbreaking television series TWIN PEAKS, capturing the cast and crew as they revisited several locations from the '90s original. A Very Lovely Dream: One Week in Twin Peaks
